The user extends their arm outward at the target with an open palm. A purple energy burst in then unleashed in a variety of ways, including a powerful shockwave or a ball of great concussive force.

== Trivia ==
* This technique references the tale of [[Wikipedia:Urashima Tarō|Urashima Tarō]], Urashiki's namesake. In the story, Urashima rescues a turtle and is rewarded for his kindness with a trip to "[[wikipedia:Ryūgū-jō|Ryūgū-jō]]", the underwater Dragon Palace, home of the [[Wikipedia:Ryūjin|dragon kami]] of the sea. Upon returning home, he is gifted a "[[wikipedia:Tamatebako|jeweled box]]" {{translation|玉匣|gyokkō}} and warned not to open it.
